item.title: McCormick responds to Squad member who claims 'white supremacy and xenophobia' are the right's 'true religion'
item.description: Sen. Dave McCormick responded to Rep. Summer Lee's assertion that "white supremacy and xenophobia" are the political right's "true religion."

item.title: Trump's latest hires and fires rankle Iran hawks as new president suggests nuclear deal
item.description: If President Donald Trump’s personnel moves are any tell, he may come out of the gate toward Iran with a tone that is more diplomatic than combative.

item.title: Trump’s ICE nabs child sex offenders among 530+ illegal immigrants caught in single day
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) arrested a slew of child sex offenders as part of their operations to pick up illegal immigrants
